text: allaah ne un logon se jo tumamen se eemaan lae aur unhone achchhe karm kie, vaada kiya hai ki vah unhen dharatee mein avashy sattaadhikaar pradaan karega, jaise usane unase pahale ke logon ko sattaadhikaar pradaan kiya tha. aur unake lie avashy unake us dharm ko jamaav pradaan karega jise usane unake lie pasand kiya hai. aur nishchay hee unake vartamaan bhay ke pashchaat use unake lie shaanti aur nishchintata mein badal dega. ve meree bandagee karate hai, mere saath kisee cheez ko saajhee nahin banaate. aur jo koee isake pashchaat inakaar kare, to aise hee log avagyaakaaree hai
